meanings.definition: A type of chemical compound containing two hydroxyl groups attached to a benzene ring.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the quinols in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Quinols are important compounds in organic chemistry.
meanings.sent3: The quinols in the experiment decided to throw a party in the beaker.
meanings.sent4: The quinols danced around the benzene ring like tiny cheerleaders.
meanings.sent5: The colorful quinols sparkled under the microscope.
